Endianness information
[Macros and data types commonly used]


Defines

#define FETION_LIL_ENDIAN   1234
 Little endianness.
#define FETION_BIG_ENDIAN   4321
 Big endianness.
#define FETION_BYTEORDER   FETION_BIG_ENDIAN
 The byte order (endianness) of the target system.

Define Documentation

#define FETION_BYTEORDER   FETION_BIG_ENDIAN

The byte order (endianness) of the target system.

This macro will be either defined to FETION_LIL_ENDIAN or FETION_BIG_ENDIAN. You can use the code like below

 #if FETION_BYTEORDER == FETION_LIL_ENDIAN
     ... // code for little endian system.
 #else
     ... // code for big endian system.
 #endif

to write endianness independent code.
